Html: I just started using Rawr so maybe I'm doing something wrong. I went into edit items and clicked add and then put in the item ID of the item I wanted. It then appeared in the list of items in the edit item dialog. It appeared as if it would appear everywhere else, but no matter what item I add it never appears ANYWHERE except the edit items dialog. If I click an item to try and equip it and start typing the name it doesnt appear or if I use the right column and sort alphabetically it doesn't appear. How the heck do I use items I've added?
To be a bit more specific, one of the items I was trying to add was http://www.wowhead.com/?item=50213 Mord'rethar Robes. I am using the Mage Rawr.
First, I would recommend reading the posting guidlines, as it will tell you what I am about to tell you.  Post this in the issue tracker with your character's xml file.
Most likely the cause is in filters you're using.
